abstract: Dollar Thrifty Automotive Group shareholders rejected a nearly $1.5 billion takeover offer from Hertz Global Holdings, a day after Avis Budget Group sweetened its own offer.
snippet: Dollar Thrifty Automotive Group shareholders rejected a nearly $1.5 billion takeover offer from Hertz Global Holdings, a day after Avis Budget Group sweetened its own offer.
lead_paragraph: 5:29 p.m. | Updated Shareholders of the Dollar Thrifty Automotive Group rejected on Thursday a nearly $1.5 billion takeover offer from Hertz Global Holdings, and Hertz, as promised, ended the bid, opening the door for the Avis Budget Group to pursue its own higher offer for the company.

headline.main: Dollar Thrifty Shareholders Reject Hertz Bid
